snippet.title: Planetary taxi (1995) PC infomedia educational cd-rom
snippet.description: Zoom through a scale model of the solar system at the wheel of your own cosmic taxicab, dropping off wacky passengers--mountain climbers, aliens, little old ladies--as you go. In the process, find out where a golf ball will fly the farthest, bounce the highest, or freeze the fastest. These and a thousand more facts about our solar system come to life in this entertaining game of discovery. Aspiring astronomers and physicists will also love the spectacular QuickTime movies of recent space missions and NASA fly-bys.
